<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_dev_tool_operation"><u_dev_tool_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_class_name>u_dev_tool_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-27 14:40:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>0ca524762f874110a8ce2b5df699b699</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Test CSV</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Developer Operations" source="046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Developer Operations">046ce6ca2f910110a8ce2b5df699b6f9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>u_dev_tool_operation_0ca524762f874110a8ce2b5df699b699</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-02 12:57:04</sys_updated_on><u_active>true</u_active><u_condition/><u_conditional>false</u_conditional><u_description/><u_name>Test CSV</u_name><u_script><![CDATA[var currentRecord = current; //Current GlideRecord

var csv = new DevOperationCSV();
csv.addHeader('name', 'age', 'coolness', 'description', 'some object');

var row = csv.addRow();
row.name = 'Erik Anderson';
row.age = 27;
row.coolness = 'wicked';
row.description = 'Some guy';
row['some object'] = {
    hello: 'hi',
    hello2: 'whatsup'
};


csv.build();
result = csv.createAttachment('Test_' + new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue());]]></u_script><u_table>global</u_table></u_dev_tool_operation></record_update>
